mapper.select: SELECT t_1.gameid,t_1.snid,t_3.retention,t_3.ds,t_1.install_num,t_3.dr,t_3.creative ,ROUND(t_3.retention/t_1.install_num,4) retentionPercentages from (SELECT gameid,snid,ds,creative,SUM(install_num) install_num FROM daily_os_creative_stats WHERE ds>=#{startDs} and ds<=#{endDs} AND gameid=#{gameId} GROUP BY gameid,snid,ds,creative) t_1 JOIN (SELECT ds,dr,retention,creative FROM( SELECT DATE_SUB(ds,INTERVAL dr DAY) ds,dr,SUM(retention) retention,creative FROM retention_os_creative WHERE gameid=#{gameId} AND ds>=#{startDs} and ds<=#{endDs} GROUP BY ds,dr,creative) t_2) t_3 ON t_1.ds=t_3.ds AND t_1.creative=t_3.creative ORDER BY ds,dr
